column2: Remarks
column3: Group code
column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column2: Property name
column3: Contents of property

column2: Operation status
column3: This property indicates the ON/OFF status.

column2: Integral gas consumption of metering data 1
column3: This property indicates integral gas consumption in units of 0.0001 m3.

column2: Integral gas consumption of metering data 2
column3: This property indicates integral gas consumption in units of 0.001 m3.

column2: Error detection statusof metering data
column3: This property indicates status where meter detected metering data error.
column4: Error detection status found = 0x41 Error detection status not found = 0x42

column2: Security data 1
column3: This property indicates security data to define security information on meter operation by bit allocation.

column2: Security data 2
column3: This property indicates security data to define security information on meter operation by bit allocation.

column2: Center valve shut-off status
column3: This property indicates status where gas shut-off valve of meter has been shut off by center.
column4: Center valve shut-off status found = 0x41 Center valve shut-off status not found = 0x42

column2: Center valve shut-off recovery permission setting status
column3: This property indicates status where gas shut-off valve of meter has been shut off by center.
column4: Center valve shut-off reset enable = 0x41 Center valve shut-off reset not enable = 0x42

column2: Emergency valve shut-off status
column3: This property indicates status where gas shut-off valve of meter has been shut off.
column4: Emergency valve shut-off status found = 0x41 Emergency valve shut-off status not found = 0x42

column2: Shut-off valve open/close status
column3: This property indicates open/close status of shut-off valve.
column4: Shut-off valve open status = 0x41 Shut-off valve close status = 0x42

column2: Residual volume control warning
column3: This property indicates status as warning where residual volume is very small.
column4: Residual volume control warning level 1 0x31 Residual volume control warning level 2 0x32 Residual volume control warning level 3 0x33 No residual volume control warning 0x42

column2: Set value of residual volume control warning level 1
column3: Sets “Small residual volume detection level 1”.

column2: Set value of residual volume control warning level 2
column3: Sets “Small residual volume detection level 2”.

column2: Set value of residual volume control warning level 3
column3: Sets “Small residual volume detection level 3”.

column2: Slight leak timer value (gas flow rate continuation)
column3: This property indicates number of days on which gas flow rate is continued.

column2: Slight leak timer value (without pressure increase)
column3: This property indicates number of days on which gas leak monitoring is performed without gas pressure increase.

column2: Shut-off reason log
column3: Defines log of reasons for gas shut-off by shut-off valve in 1 byte each with bits assigned. Shows the last three logs. Log 3: log 2: log 1

column2: Maximum value of supply pressure data
column3: This property indicates maximum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

column2: Minimum value of supply pressure data
column3: This property indicates minimum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

column2: Current value of supply pressure data
column3: This property indicates current value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

column2: Maximum value of block pressure data
column3: This property indicates minimum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

column2: Minimum value of block pressure data
column3: This property indicates minimum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

column2: Current value of block pressure data
column3: This property indicates current value of block pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

column2: Number of block pressure/supply pressure error days:time
column3: This property indicates number of days on which block pressure/supply pressure errors occurred in 1 byte  each.
column4: Number of block pressure error days: Number of supply pressure error days: Number of block pressure error times: Number of supply pressure error times

column2: Test call setting
column3: Performs test call operation setup.
column4: Test call operation ON 0x41 Test call operation OFF 0x42
